{"citation purposes": ["background", "result", "method"], "text": "However, how frataxin interacts with the Fe-S cluster biosynthesis components remains unclear as direct one-to-one interactions with each component were reported (IscS [12,22], IscU/Isu1 [6,11,16] or ISD11/Isd11 [14,15]).", "question": "What is the citation purpose of the text above?", "answer": "background"}
{"citation purposes": ["background", "result", "method"], "text": "Consistent with previous reports (al-Khodairy et al., 1995; Seufert et al., 1995; Tanaka et al., 1999; Biggins et al., 2001), our data showed that Smt3 and Ubc9 have pivotal functions during mitosis.", "question": "What is the citation purpose of the text above?", "answer": "result"}
{"citation purposes": ["background", "result", "method"], "text": "Clinical reports of energetic stress in HCM hearts (14, 15) prompted us to measure mitochondrial respiration, mitochondrial copy number, ROS emission/scavenging, and calcium handling in these 2 HCM mouse models.", "question": "What is the citation purpose of the text above?", "answer": "method"}

- Small sample volume required and
rapid completion rate
- Requires specialized equipment
and correct antibody pair
Wong et al., 2017
